channel.title: Corrupted-souls Looking for Developers
channel.description:
Welcome to the second CORRUPTED-SOULS development thread. As some of you may know/seen the old thread, which was a 317/600+ and fairly great server, surly there are better ones out there. but enough of that onto the new 667/711 corrupted-souls.
~Staff Team~ Founder - Daniel Developers - Daniel, Victoria. forums developer - Blank[Needing someone asap!]
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Application Format.
Name-?? Position- developer/webdeveloper/gfx Skype-?? Experience-?? Previous work-?? Rate your knowledge- 1/10 "On what your applying for" Links to some work, photos, forums, etc. ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Admins - Genked - Childofkorn - behind_you
This is a the original "ZENITH-SCAPE" source/client i have added a lot of features that weren't in the source, still working on changing the client but a lot of my work is going into the source before the client is done. - High-scores side bar. - Experience calculator. - Auto donation side bar. - multiple colored schemes. - Just a few things I'm going to add to the client!
Eco-Based server / Vps hosted / Website / Active Community! Soon to buy an Advert sponsorship on Moparscape.
Over 30 players in-game and 50 on forums, constantly have players online and more join everyday.
Edit** Webdeveloper is no longer working with us as he never has time to do anything for us anymore and is doing his own thing.
Complete. Undergoing Construction. Not Started.
Skills. All skills are complete, few still contain minor bugs. -Attack -Strength -Defense -Range -Prayer -Mage -Rune-crafting -Construction -Dungeoneering -Constitution -Agility -Herb-lore -Thieving -Crafting -Fletch -Slayer -Hunter -Mining -Smithing -Fishing -Cooking -Fire-making -Woodcutting -Farming -Summoning
All loyalty features like. -Auras -Titles -Emotes -clothes Are all completely added, just designing a shop for them, and will be creating it through MySQL for the points.
Perfect Pking/Switching/Pvming
Hunting will soon be made all over Corrupted-souls butterfly's/implings/birds will all be randomly generated/moving around the place.
Mini-games. -Barrows -Castle wars -Dominion tower -Barrows -Souls wars -Duel arena
Bosses. -Gwd -Kbd -Qbd -Corp -Td -Jad -Nomad -Nex -Chaos elly
Most drops have been fixed, a lot of shops are to be introduced soon, a new home,
I'm also in the middle of finishing of a 100k below and above trade limit, this will hopefully keep the Eco steady and stop scamming, also to stop people Xferring from muted accounts/badly known accounts.
G.E buying system is working great, working on the selling part so it can be sold 15% below and higher then its set price which will then become apart of buying 15% lower or higher, pretty much like runescape but the prices wont change as often and the price will not be any higher/lower then that 15% range.
Due to there being over 16k items its taking me a very long time to change all the item prices to what i would like them to be for Eco in Trade, and GE.
I will Add media tomorrow as its past midnight at the moment.
Credits.
*Zenithscape* TheWebGuy Myself Pirre Victoria And myself Daniel
If i have left out anyone, please let me no asap so i can put you in there, I'm way to tired to remember everyone that has contributed help to us but we thank you a lot :D
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/kyubt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15psayb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20jn31w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lnz286.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/35831vn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34g555v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qkt3cy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/358dk0j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/dzja4y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/51eul1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yx28g4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fntfnl.png[/img]

item.description:
@jewystrength wrote:

Name-Jon
Position- developer/gfx - good with both
Skype-tankdds
Experience-5 years of Java knowledge about 2 years spent actually programming RSPS
Previous work-
ALL OF THESE VIDEOS are old from like 2007-2009
And yes i helped code for lethium, i made corp and tds.

THESE VIDEOS RANGE FROM THE FIRST MONTH OF MY PROGRAMMING EXPERIENCE TO LAST YEAR

Rate your knowledge- since it’s been off and on id say 6-8/10

Server i was working on but cant afford a vps and i cant port forward with comcast’s routers anymore
http://www.eldrazi.comeze.com

item.title: Corrupted-souls Looking for Developers
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

Welcome to the second CORRUPTED-SOULS development thread.
As some of you may know/seen the old thread, which was a 317/600+ and fairly great server, surly there are better ones out there. but enough of that onto the new 667/711 corrupted-souls.

~Staff Team~
Founder - Daniel
Developers - Daniel, Victoria.
forums developer - Blank[Needing someone asap!]

Application Format.

Name-??
Position- developer/webdeveloper/gfx
Skype-??
Experience-??
Previous work-??
Rate your knowledge- 1/10 “On what your applying for”
Links to some work, photos, forums, etc.

Admins

  • Genked
  • Childofkorn
  • behind_you

This is a the original “ZENITH-SCAPE” source/client i have added a lot of features that weren’t in the source, still working on changing the client but a lot of my work is going into the source before the client is done.

  • High-scores side bar.
  • Experience calculator.
  • Auto donation side bar.
  • multiple colored schemes.
  • Just a few things I’m going to add to the client!

Eco-Based server / Vps hosted / Website / Active Community! Soon to buy an Advert sponsorship on Moparscape.

Over 30 players in-game and 50 on forums, constantly have players online and more join everyday.

Edit**
Webdeveloper is no longer working with us as he never has time to do anything for us anymore and is doing his own thing.

Complete.
Undergoing Construction.
Not Started.

Skills.
All skills are complete, few still contain minor bugs.
-Attack
-Strength
-Defense
-Range
-Prayer

-Woodcutting
-Farming
-Summoning

All loyalty features like.
-Auras
-Titles
-Emotes
-clothes
Are all completely added, just designing a shop for them, and will be creating it through MySQL for the points.

Perfect Pking/Switching/Pvming

Hunting will soon be made all over Corrupted-souls butterfly’s/implings/birds will all be randomly generated/moving around the place.

Mini-games.
-Barrows
-Castle wars
-Dominion tower
-Barrows
-Souls wars
-Duel arena

Bosses.
-Gwd
-Kbd
-Qbd
-Corp
-Td
-Jad
-Nomad
-Nex
-Chaos elly

Most drops have been fixed, a lot of shops are to be introduced soon, a new home,

I’m also in the middle of finishing of a 100k below and above trade limit, this will hopefully keep the Eco steady and stop scamming, also to stop people Xferring from muted accounts/badly known accounts.

G.E buying system is working great, working on the selling part so it can be sold 15% below and higher then its set price which will then become apart of buying 15% lower or higher, pretty much like runescape but the prices wont change as often and the price will not be any higher/lower then that 15% range.

Due to there being over 16k items its taking me a very long time to change all the item prices to what i would like them to be for Eco in Trade, and GE.

I will Add media tomorrow as its past midnight at the moment.

Credits.

Zenithscape
TheWebGuy
Myself
Pirre
Victoria
And myself Daniel

If i have left out anyone, please let me no asap so i can put you in there, I’m way to tired to remember everyone that has contributed help to us but we thank you a lot
